channel.title: CVE Feed for QuadLayers -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QuadLayers -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-4443|2024-10-16T18:22:21.423Z -- quadlayers -- wordpress%20mega%20menu%20%E2%80%93%20quadmenu
item.description: The WordPress Mega Menu plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Arbitrary File Creation in versions up to, and including, 2.0.6 via the compiler_save AJAX action. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to create arbitrary PHP files that can be used to execute malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2023-47681|2024-08-02T21:16:42.692Z -- quadlayers -- woocommerce%20checkout%20manager
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in QuadLayers WooCommerce Checkout Manager.This issue affects WooCommerce Checkout Manager: from n/a through 7.3.0.

item.description: The WordPress Mega Menu plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Arbitrary File Creation in versions up to, and including, 2.0.6 via the compiler_save AJAX action. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to create arbitrary PHP files that can be used to execute malicious code.
